group_1.narration: Who'd have thought ghosts need a license?!@You never hear about it when you're alive!
And that wasn't the only surprise...

group_1.textRight: This place is amazing.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...

group_1.textRight: A cafe just for ghosts. And not only@ghosts...
All the people here are former Magical@Girls!

group_1.textLeft: It IS a shock at first.
But you'll get used to it in no time!@Check this out for instance...
Here you go!

group_1.textRight: [chara:303700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Whoa!

group_1.textLeft: Eat up! It's for you!

group_1.textRight: A slice of cake...and tea to go with it!

group_1.textLeft: You can turn almost anything you can think@of into reality here.
Even the cafe was dreamed up by someone@at some point.
And you can make something show up@using info from other people, too.
You just have to base it off of the details.@Sound, taste, appearance.
That's why we all meet up here to talk about@things and try thinking up new stuff.

group_1.textRight: Wow, that's neat...
Can we do other cool things like that?

group_1.narration: I asked the group of "ex" Magical Girls@about all kinds of stuff.
First they explained that we can't make@direct contact with our former world...@The world we all once lived in.

group_1.textLeft: But we can peek in on it.
Of course, even if we can look in, we can't@talk to people who are still alive.

group_1.textRight: Kinda expected that... We are ghosts after@all.

group_1.textLeft: If you want it badly enough, though, there@might be a way to make contact.

group_1.textRight: [chara:303700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Really?!

group_1.narration: You need to meet certain conditions@to make it happen.
It depends on the person.@It's rare to get it to work though.
Certain people can hear our voices.@The process relies on people with@sensitivity to ghosts... Psychics!

group_1.textRight: We can also move anything that isn't alive.@It's not much, but it's something...
You can do that by imagining moving it, just@like how you make things appear.

group_1.textLeft: So you focus really hard on it moving...
It'll move, but you can only really manage@stuff like rattling a plate.

group_1.textRight: Rattling plates...
Ooh! I think I saw something like that in a@horror movie once!

group_1.textLeft: Like a poltergeist...
So this is the truth behind all that.
Kinda makes you feel small, doesn't it?

group_1.textRight: Oh, I guess it does...

group_1.narration: We also chatted a bunch about everyone's@former lives...

group_1.textLeft: So you turned into a Witch at the end?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
I remember the moment I died, but my memory@is hazy after I became a Witch.

group_1.textLeft: I know. That's how it was for me too.
Same here...

group_1.textRight: So you guys had the same experience!

group_1.textLeft: You though, Kanae... You died 'cause@your Soul Gem broke, right?

group_1.textRight: Kanae...

group_1.textLeft: *Sighhh*
This is all so cruel... I was totally duped.

group_1.textRight: Kyubey...

group_1.textLeft: At first I hated him so much.
But over time I just got tired. I know@I can't change what happened, so...
Yeah, same...

group_1.textRight: I can see why.
Hey, how long have you guys been here?

group_1.textLeft: That's a good question. How long HAVE@we been here?

group_1.narration: I asked about their ages, and@they turned out to be around my age.@They'd just lived a while before I did.
Everyone I asked had a different answer.@When they lived, where they lived...@Even the people they knew were@all completely different.
My new ghostly life began surrounded@by all those different girls...
